text: Zarja Kaspija Astrakhan, also known as Dinamo Astrakhan, is a Russian handball team located in Astrakhan. Their home matches are played at the Sports Complex Star. They compete in the Russian Handball Super League. ==Accomplishments== *Sovietic Liga: **Winners (1) : 1990 *Russian Handball Super League: **Runners Up (8) : 2001, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008 *EHF Champions League: **Semifinalist (1) : 1991 *EHF Cup: **Runner-Up (1) : 2003 ==European record == {| class="wikitable" !
